title: It's coming down, down, down, It's coming down, And the glory of the Lard Is coming down, When the Saints begin to pray And the Lord is on His way, And the glory of the Lord Is coming down.
lyrics: It's coming down, down, down, It's coming down, And the glory of the Lard Is coming down, When the Saints begin to pray And the Lord is on His way, And the glory of the Lord Is coming down.
